text: Bludgeoning Angel Dokuro-Chan (撲殺天使ドクロちゃん, Bokusatsu Tenshi Dokuro-Chan) is a light novel series created by Masaki Okayu in 2003, it first got a manga adaptation, then it received a visual novel adaptation, after that it received a anime adaptation that ran from 2005 until 2007. The series was illustrated by Torishimo. == Plot == It is about Sakura Kusakabe (草壁 桜), a 14-year-old middle school student who in the future will discover Immortality but by discovering it, he makes a device that stops all women from aging after they turn 12-years-old because he wants to build a "Lolicon's world", God is not happy with this so he sents Dokuro Mitsukai, a 12-year-old Angel assassin from the future to kill Sakura. However, instead of killing Sakura as she was tasked to do, Dokuro falls in love with him, Dokuro also often kills Sakura with a club called the "Excalibolg", which has a resemblance to a baseball bat but with spikes on it. == References == Category:2005 anime television series Category:2007 anime television series Category:Anime Category:Manga Category:Light novels
title: Bludgeoning Angel Dokuro-Chan
